description: Flavor entities need to expose a 'vcpus' attribute according to the v1.1 spec: http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Get_Flavor_Details-d1e4317.html
title: OSAPI v1.1 Flavors should have a 'vcpus' attribute

comments.content: Flavor entities need to expose a 'vcpus' attribute according to the v1.1 spec: http://docs.openstack.org/cactus/openstack-compute/developer/openstack-compute-api-1.1/content/Get_Flavor_Details-d1e4317.html
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
